code: /**  * Service responsible for managing scripts.  */ public ScriptService getScriptService() {     return scriptService. }

comment: /**  * Allow the script service to register any settings update handlers on the cluster settings  */
code: /**  * Allow the script service to register any settings update handlers on the cluster settings  */ public void registerClusterSettingsListeners(ClusterSettings clusterSettings) {     scriptService.registerClusterSettingsListeners(clusterSettings). }
